GSD.product_version: versions from v4.0 to before v6.1.9
GSD.description:
HID: betop: check shape of output reports

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.1.9 by commit 07bc32e53c7bd5c91472cc485231ef6274db9b76, it was introduced in version v4.0 by commit 52cd7785f3cdd2724f4efb5b21dbc75d6f9ccef4. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: HID: betop: check shape of output reports
